column4: segmentation fault when apt-get install, anyone experienced this?
can we see the full error please
when i try for example sudo apt-get install mc i recieve something like: Reading state information... Done, Segmentation fault and that is all
what about sudo apt-get update
i tried this, solved nothing
can you give a pastebin of the screen please
where to paste this screen?
http://paste.ubuntu.com/38768/ is in polish locale
why are you running a root shell?
are you logged in as root?
no, its sudo bash
try running terminal as you and using sud apt-get update
you dont have to run sudo bash or any other garbage like that
with sudo nothing changed, still segmentation fault, also when i try sudo apt-get upgrade
try http://linux.derkeiler.com/Mailing-Lists/Debian/2008-06/msg01521.html
i tried this, still, i get segmentation fault
then you could remove apt then reinstall it from your install cd
how to reinstall apt-get through dpkg?
find the apt ddeb on your cd the dpkg -i <deb file>
check in /etc/samba/smb.conf you'll need sudo or gksu to edit
thanx
